captions.text: The Best Grandpa

"How To Have The Best Family
Life" I don't think I've

ever read this. Let's take a looky.
"Being the best

grandpa. Learn the preferences
and interests of your

grandkids." Not a problem.
The girls like clothes.

Dear girls! Grandpa is here
with presents for you!
Some new beads?
A Kitty Purry CD?
Clothes.
Here. Now why don't you go and try them on?
We will. In just a little while.
Grandpa, thank you so much.
These clothes... what are they, antiques?!
Quiet, he'll hear you.

"Actively participate in the
hobbies of your grandkids."
I can't wear this for one more second.

Let's start a rocking and
rolling band, kids! We

could be bigger than the BEAGLES.
Let's funky out!!
Percussion by Grandpa Groovy!

Left paw, Right paw, Left paw, Right paw, Left
paw, Right paw, Left paw, Right paw! Let's

bring it around now, girls... Like you mean it!
Come on! Come on! It's not the Hokey-Pokey...
Big smiles! Make those eyes pop! Good work!

Now let's do the whole thing
again, but with vocals!

I'VE GOT A BIG FAT DREAM / SOME PEOPLE
THINK I'M NUTS / BUT I DON'T CARE
Louder! Like your life depends on it!

I'M STRONGER THAN (OFF) I SEEM / I'VE
GOT A TON OF GUTS / I'LL MAKE IT THERE!
That's more like it! Let's take it home!!

WHEN I GET TO MUSIC CITY / I WILL BLOW THEM ALL
AWAY / I (OFF) WILL BE A SUPER-DUPER STAR!

I AM SMART AND I AM PRETTY / EV'RYONE IS GONNA
SAY / 'HOW COULD ANYBODY CLIMB SO FAST SO FAR?!
What the heck's going on in here?!

The decibel level in here is outside
established parameters of courtesy.

Yes! Yes it is! And isn't it mega-righteous?
I've got some presents for you boys, too.

Thanks a lot, Granddaddy. But
this is a toy for babies.

You're welcome. Let me hold onto
these, while you eat this lollipop.
Chemistry is a really cool hobby...
Stop! What are you doing?!
Oh, jeez!!!

Well... it's fine. Come on,
let's all take a little walk.

And when we get back... The
room'll be as good as new!
And throw!

I'm a little bit tired for some
reason... I better go lie down.

Granddaddy! Hey, Grandpa! Grandpa
forgot to take his book with him.

"How To Have The Best Family Life"
"Being the very best grandkids..."

Granddaddy! I've got
some prune jelly for you!

Grandpa! I brought some high-fiber bran muffins!
Grandpa! Grandpa!

You awake? Grandpa! This tea
should really perk you right up
Want me to read you my poem about boogers?
These are really good for your colon.

Do you need more pillows?
I could read this book to you...

Want me to wipe your nose?
Hey, wait, I've

got it! Let's all go
for a walk together.
Yes, yes! Hurrah! Let's go!

title: Барбоскины - 117 серия. Самый лучший дед (новые серии)
